info.name: GRM Management API v1
info.description:
Complete API collection for GRM Management workspace booking platform.

Base URL: {{base_url}}/api/method/grm_management.grm_management.api.v1

All responses follow the format:
```json
{
  "success": true/false,
  "http_status_code": 200,
  "message": { "en": "English message", "ar": "Arabic message" },
  "data": { ... }
}
```

## Authentication
Most endpoints require authentication via Frappe session cookies.
Use the Login endpoint first to obtain a session, then subsequent requests will use the cookies automatically.

## Bilingual Messages
All `message` fields return an object with `en` (English) and `ar` (Arabic) translations.

## Setup
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Set the `base_url` variable to your Frappe site URL (e.g. http://localhost:8080)
3. Set `test_email` and `test_password` for auth testing

request.description:
Check whether the current request is authenticated.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Returns:**
- `200` - Authentication status with user info

response.name: Authenticated
Not Authenticated

request.description:
Log in a user with email and password.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| usr | string | Yes | User email or username |
| pwd | string | Yes | User password |

**Returns:**
- `200` - Login successful (sets session cookie)
- `400` - Missing credentials
- `401` - Invalid credentials
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success
Invalid Credentials
Missing Credentials

request.description:
Log out the current user.

**Auth Required:** Yes

**Returns:**
- `200` - Logout successful
- `401` - Not authenticated
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success

request.description:
Register a new individual website user. Creates User + GRM Tenant + ERPNext Customer.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| email | string | Yes | User email |
| password | string | Yes | Min 4 characters |
| first_name | string | Yes | First name |
| last_name | string | No | Last name |
| phone | string | No | Phone number |
| tenant_type | string | No | "Individual" (default) or "Company" |

**Returns:**
- `201` - Signup successful
- `400` - Validation error
- `409` - Email already exists
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success
Email Exists

request.description:
Register a new company website user. Creates User + GRM Tenant (Company) + ERPNext Customer.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Additional Company Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| tenant_type | string | Yes | Must be "Company" |
| company_name | string | Yes | Company name |
| commercial_registration | string | No | CR number |
| tax_id | string | No | Tax ID / VAT number |

**Returns:**
- `201` - Signup successful
- `400` - Validation error (e.g. missing company_name)
- `409` - Email already exists
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success

request.description:
Get profile details of the authenticated user including tenant info.

**Auth Required:** Yes

**Returns:**
- `200` - User profile + tenant data
- `401` - Not authenticated
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "http_status_code": 200,
  "message": { "en": "User profile retrieved successfully", "ar": "تم استرجاع الملف الشخصي بنجاح" },
  "data": {
    "user": "test@example.com",
    "full_name": "Ahmed Ali",
    "email": "test@example.com",
    "first_name": "Ahmed",
    "last_name": "Ali",
    "user_image": "/files/profile.jpg",
    "phone": "+966501234567",
    "roles": ["Customer"],
    "tenant": {
      "tenant_id": "GRM-TENANT-0001",
      "tenant_name": "Ahmed Ali",
      "tenant_type": "Individual",
      "status": "Active",
      "phone": "+966501234567",
      "company_name": null,
      "commercial_registration": null,
      "tax_id": null,
      "city": "Riyadh",
      "address": "123 Main St"
    },
    "gender": null,
    "date_of_birth": null,
    "username": null
  }
}

request.description:
Update profile info for the current user.
Changes are synced across **User**, **GRM Tenant**, and **linked Customer** docs.

All params are optional - only provided fields are updated.

**Auth Required:** Yes

**Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| first_name | string | No | First name |
| last_name | string | No | Last name |
| phone | string | No | Phone / mobile number |
| user_image | string | No | URL / path to profile image |
| company_name | string | No | Company name (for Company tenants) |
| commercial_registration | string | No | CR number |
| tax_id | string | No | Tax ID / VAT number |
| city | string | No | City |
| address | string | No | Address line 1 |

**Sync Behavior:**
- **User doc:** first_name, last_name, mobile_no, user_image
- **GRM Tenant:** phone, tenant_name, company fields, city, address
- **Customer:** customer_name, mobile_no, image, tax_id

**Returns:**
- `200` - Profile updated
- `401` - Not authenticated
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success

request.description:
Change the password for the current user (requires current password).

**Auth Required:** Yes

**Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| current_password | string | Yes | Current password |
| new_password | string | Yes | New password (min 4 chars) |

**Returns:**
- `200` - Password changed
- `400` - Validation error / short password
- `401` - Not authenticated / wrong current password
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success
Wrong Current Password
Short Password

request.description:
Send a 6-digit verification code to the user's email for password reset.

Always returns a generic success message to prevent user enumeration.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Rate Limit:** 5 requests per email per hour

**Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| email | string | Yes | User email address |

**Flow:**
1. Call this endpoint with user's email
2. User receives a 6-digit code via email (valid for 15 minutes)
3. Call `verify_reset_code` with the code + new password

**Returns:**
- `200` - Generic success (code sent if account exists)
- `400` - Missing/invalid email
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success
Missing Email
Invalid Email

request.description:
Verify the 6-digit reset code and set a new password.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Rate Limit:** 10 requests per email per hour

**Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| email | string | Yes | User email address |
| code | string | Yes | 6-digit verification code from email |
| new_password | string | Yes | New password (min 4 chars) |

**Security:**
- Code expires after 15 minutes
- Max 5 wrong attempts per code (then code is invalidated)
- Rate limited per email

**Returns:**
- `200` - Password reset successful
- `400` - Invalid/expired code or validation error
- `404` - User not found
- `429` - Too many invalid attempts
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success
Invalid Code
Expired Code
Too Many Attempts

item.name: Spaces
item.description:
Workspace browsing endpoints.

Module: `spaces.py`

All endpoints are publicly accessible (allow_guest).

query.description: Filter by status: Available, Rented, Not Ready, Under Maintenance, Reserved

request.description:
Get GRM Spaces grouped by GRM Space Type.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Query Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| location | string | No | Filter by location name |
| status | string | No | Filter by status (Available, Rented, Not Ready, Under Maintenance, Reserved) |

**Returns:**
- `200` - Spaces grouped by type with full details including Arabic names, amenities, images
- `400` - Invalid status value
- `404` - Location not found
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success

item.name: Get Spaces By Type (with Location filter)

request.description: Get spaces filtered by a specific location name.
Get only available spaces grouped by type.

Get a single GRM Space by its ID (DocName).

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Query Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | string | Yes | GRM Space ID (e.g. SPACE-2026-0001) |

**Returns:**
- `200` - Full space details with type info, amenities, location (EN + AR)
- `400` - Missing id parameter
- `404` - Space not found
- `500` - Server error

Get all active GRM Space Types.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Returns:**
- `200` - List of all active space types with details (EN + AR names, pricing, capacities)
- `500` - Server error

request.description:
Check if a space is available for booking at the specified time.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Query Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| space | string | Yes | GRM Space ID |
| booking_date | string | Yes | Date (YYYY-MM-DD) |
| start_time | string | Yes | Start time (HH:MM) |
| end_time | string | Yes | End time (HH:MM) |

**Returns:**
- `200` - Space is available + pricing estimate
- `400` - Validation error (past date, below min hours)
- `404` - Space not found
- `409` - Space not available (not bookable, wrong status, or time conflict)
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Available
Not Available (Time Conflict)
Space Not Bookable
Space Not Available

request.description:
Create a new booking for the current logged-in user.

**Auth Required:** Yes

**Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| space | string | Yes | GRM Space ID |
| booking_date | string | Yes | Date (YYYY-MM-DD) |
| start_time | string | Yes | Start time (HH:MM) |
| end_time | string | Yes | End time (HH:MM) |
| booking_type | string | No | Hourly (default), Daily, Multi-day |
| attendees | int | No | Number of attendees (default: 1) |
| purpose | string | No | Purpose of booking (max 500 chars) |
| notes | string | No | Additional notes (max 1000 chars) |

**Returns:**
- `201` - Booking created
- `400` - Validation error
- `401` - Not authenticated
- `404` - Space not found / no tenant
- `409` - Space unavailable (conflict)
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "http_status_code": 201,
  "message": { "en": "Booking created successfully", "ar": "تم إنشاء الحجز بنجاح" },
  "data": {
    "id": "GRM-BOOK-0001",
    "status": "Draft",
    "space": {
      "id": "SPACE-2026-0001",
      "name": "Executive Office A",
      "location": "Main Branch"
    },
    "booking_date": "2026-03-01",
    "start_time": "09:00:00",
    "end_time": "11:00:00",
    "duration_hours": 2.0,
    "attendees": 2,
    "rate_type": "Hourly",
    "subtotal": 200.0,
    "total_amount": 200.0,
    "payment_status": "Unpaid"
  }
}

response.name: Conflict

request.description:
Confirm a draft booking.

**Auth Required:** Yes

**Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| booking_id | string | Yes | The booking ID to confirm |

**Returns:**
- `200` - Booking confirmed
- `400` - Invalid status (not Draft)
- `401` - Not authenticated
- `403` - Not the booking owner
- `404` - Booking not found
- `409` - Space no longer available
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success
Not Draft

request.description:
Cancel a booking.

**Auth Required:** Yes

**Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| booking_id | string | Yes | The booking ID to cancel |
| reason | string | No | Cancellation reason (max 500 chars) |

**Returns:**
- `200` - Booking cancelled
- `400` - Invalid status (already Checked-in/out/Cancelled)
- `401` - Not authenticated
- `403` - Not the booking owner
- `404` - Booking not found
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success

query.description: Filter: Draft, Confirmed, Checked-in, Checked-out, Cancelled

request.description:
Get bookings for the current logged-in user.

**Auth Required:** Yes

**Query Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| status | string | No | Filter: Draft, Confirmed, Checked-in, Checked-out, Cancelled |
| from_date | string | No | Filter from date (YYYY-MM-DD) |
| to_date | string | No | Filter to date (YYYY-MM-DD) |
| limit | int | No | Max results (default: 50, max: 100) |

**Returns:**
- `200` - List of bookings with space info (EN + AR)
- `401` - Not authenticated
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success
response.body:

  "success": true,
  "http_status_code": 200,

        "actual_check_out": null
      }

}

request.description: Get confirmed bookings within a date range, limited to 20 results.

Get detailed information about a specific booking.

**Auth Required:** Yes

**Query Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| booking_id | string | Yes | The booking ID |

**Returns:**
- `200` - Full booking details (tenant, space, pricing, check-in/out)
- `401` - Not authenticated
- `403` - Not the booking owner
- `404` - Booking not found
- `500` - Server error

query.description: Duration per slot in minutes (default: 60, min: 15, max: 480)

request.description:
Get available time slots for a space on a specific date.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Query Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| space | string | Yes | GRM Space ID |
| date | string | Yes | Date (YYYY-MM-DD) |
| slot_duration_minutes | int | No | Slot duration in minutes (default: 60, min: 15, max: 480) |

**Returns:**
- `200` - Time slots with availability status
- `400` - Validation error
- `404` - Space not found
- `409` - Space not bookable or not available
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success
Space Not Bookable
Space Not Available

request.description:
Get dashboard summary data for the current logged-in user.
Returns tenant info, customer financials, subscriptions, booking stats, upcoming bookings, and recent activity.

**Auth Required:** Yes

**Returns:**
- `200` - Complete dashboard data
- `401` - Not authenticated
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success

item.name: SEO
item.description:
SEO metadata endpoints for frontend pages.

Module: `seo.py`

All endpoints are publicly accessible (allow_guest).

query.description: Page slug: home, spaces, booking, login, signup, profile, contact, about

request.description:
Get SEO metadata for a specific page.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Query Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| page | string | Yes | Page slug (home, spaces, booking, login, signup, profile, contact, about) |

**Returns:**
- `200` - SEO data (title, description, keywords in EN + AR)
- `400` - Missing page parameter
- `404` - Page not found
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "http_status_code": 200,
  "message": { "en": "SEO data retrieved successfully", "ar": "تم جلب بيانات SEO بنجاح" },
  "data": {
    "page": "home",
    "title": "GRM - Workspace Solutions",
    "title_ar": "GRM - حلول مساحات العمل",
    "description": "Find and book premium workspaces, private offices, meeting rooms, and co-working spaces.",
    "description_ar": "ابحث واحجز مساحات العمل المميزة، المكاتب الخاصة، قاعات الاجتماعات، ومساحات العمل المشتركة.",
    "keywords": "workspace, coworking, office, meeting room, booking",
    "keywords_ar": "مساحة عمل, عمل مشترك, مكتب, قاعة اجتماعات, حجز"
  }
}

response.name: Page Not Found

request.description: Get SEO metadata for the spaces page.

Get SEO metadata for all pages at once.
Useful for SSR / preloading all meta in one call.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Returns:**
- `200` - Dict of all pages with their SEO data (EN + AR)
- `500` - Server error

**Available pages:** home, spaces, booking, login, signup, profile, contact, about

response.name: Success

item.name: Customers
item.description:
Customer showcase endpoints for website display.

Module: `customers.py`

All endpoints are publicly accessible (allow_guest).

request.description:
Get customers marked to show on the website ("Our Customers" section).

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Returns:**
- `200` - List of featured customers with logos and descriptions (EN + AR)
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success
No Customers
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "http_status_code": 200,
  "message": { "en": "Customers retrieved successfully", "ar": "تم جلب العملاء بنجاح" },
  "data": [],
  "total": 0
}

item.name: Website CMS
item.description:
Website content management endpoints.

Module: `website.py`

All endpoints are publicly accessible (allow_guest).
All images/files are served from the public directory.

Manage content via Frappe desk:
- `/app/grm-home-page`
- `/app/grm-about-page`
- `/app/grm-clients-page`
- `/app/grm-why-page`
- `/app/grm-contact-page`

request.description:
Get all Home Page content for the website.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Sections returned:**
- `hero` - Customer rate, headings (1-3), paragraph, hero image
- `about` - Years of experience, title, description, image
- `features` - List of feature icons + titles
- `workflow` - Title, description, image, workflow items with points
- `pricing` - Title, plans with price/description/features
- `testimonials` - Title, image, list of testimonials with name/image/rate/description
- `faqs` - List of question/answer pairs

**Returns:**
- `200` - Full home page data
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success

request.description:
Get all About Page content for the website.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Sections returned:**
- `about` - Title, description, features list (strings)
- `services` - Title, description, image, list of service items (title/description/image)

**Returns:**
- `200` - About page data
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success

**Sections returned:**
- `clients` - List of client items (image, title, URL)

**Returns:**
- `200` - Clients page data
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success

request.description:

request.description:
Get all Contact Page content for the website.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Sections returned:**

- `social_links` - List of social media platforms (platform, url, icon)

**Returns:**

response.name: Success

query.description: Filter by GRM Space Type name (optional)

request.description:
Get all available spaces with full pricing for the website.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Query Parameters:**
| Param | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| space_type | string | No | Filter by GRM Space Type name |
| location | string | No | Filter by GRM Location name |

**Pricing fields returned per space:**
- `hourly_rate` - Price per hour
- `daily_rate` - Price per day
- `monthly_rate` - Price per month
- `annual_rate` - Price per year
- `minimum_charge` - Minimum booking charge

**Each space type also includes `default_pricing`** with hourly, daily, monthly, annual rates.

**Returns:**
- `200` - Spaces grouped by type with full pricing, amenities, location info
- `500` - Server error

response.name: Success

request.description:
Get content for all website pages in a single call.
Useful for SSR or preloading all CMS content at once.

**Auth Required:** No (allow_guest)

**Returns:**
- `200` - Dict with all page data keyed by page name (home, about, clients, why_grm, contact, spaces)
- `500` - Server error

**Note:** Individual page failures return `null` for that page without failing the entire request.

response.name: Success
